body:
You will need to read about web-scraping. I'd suggest to use this:

https://github.com/rchipka/node-osmosis

Or, this:

https://github.com/lapwinglabs/x-ray

Osmosis has problems with documentation, but at the end of the day, it quite simple, and it works good. X-ray has better docs, but has problems with encoding, so if you intend to scrape non-utf-8 websites, then consider to use osmosis.
title: How to generate a Facebook like Website preview for sharing?
